100561.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「も:

100562.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「怨:

100564.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「で:

100569.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「じ:

100574.<start_lip_sync n03561 _normal m00001>「…:
